content: the sophia dishcloth uses a combination of the single_crochet stitch and double_crochet stitches in a cluster to create a unique look matching dish towel pattern can be found here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sophia-dish-towel there is a video tutorial available for this pattern https //youtu be/kd_ni0bl3a0 finished size of this dishcloth is 8 inches x 8 5 inches any cotton medium-weight yarn can be used for this pattern a swatch is not needed > subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be notified when new patterns come out 1 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
